roni.com.coupons

Class CompanyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • roni.com.coupons.CompanyService

  • @Path(value="company")
public class CompanyService
extends java.lang.Object
    this Company Service class contains all the methods an authorized Company is able to reach in Coupon System
    Author:
    roni

    • Method Detail

      • getCoupon

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="coupon/{id}")
public java_beans.Coupon getCoupon(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                            int id)
        Parameters:
        id - is the Coupon ID
        Returns:
        the Coupon object associated with the given id This service method will return the Coupon only for a logged in Company that owns the Coupon

      • getAllCoupon

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="coupons")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getAllCoupon()
        Returns:
        a Collection of all Coupons owned by the logged in Company

      • getAllCouponByType

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="couponsbytype/{couponType}")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getAllCouponByType(@PathParam(value="couponType")
                                                                                                                                                          java_beans.CouponType CouponType)
        Parameters:
        CouponType - is the Coupon type (category)
        Returns:
        a Collection of all Coupons owned by the logged in Company associated with the given type

      • getAllCouponUntilDate

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="couponsbydate/{date}")
public java.util.Collection<java_beans.Coupon> getAllCouponUntilDate(@PathParam(value="date")
                                                                                                                                                       java.sql.Date date)
        Parameters:
        date - is the expiration date
        Returns:
        a Coupons Collection that will expire before the given date

      • getCompanyDetails

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="companydetails")
public java_beans.Company getCompanyDetails()
        Returns:
        the Object Company of the logged in Company

      • createCoupon

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="coupon")
public void createCoupon(java_beans.Coupon coupon)
        This service method will create a new Coupon in DB, which will be owned by the logged in Company
        Parameters:
        coupon - is the Object Coupon to Create

      • removeCoupon

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="deletecoupon")
public void removeCoupon(java_beans.Coupon coupon)
        This service method will delete the given Coupon from the DB
        Parameters:
        coupon - is the Object Coupon to Delete

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="updatecoupon")
public void updatecoupon(java_beans.Coupon coupon)
        This service method will update the given Coupon in DB
        Parameters:
        coupon - is the Object Coupon to Update
